value:
My students clearly have something
to say about my look, but whenever
I ask they simply avoid the question.

I don't use much flourish or detail
when I write. It's probably because
I was raised as a mercenary.

I have heard that Khadein's magic is
strong against dragons. From what
I've seen, I do believe it.

All I know about strategy and tactics,
I learned from my father. I can pass
those lessons on to you, if you'd like.

Mages should not neglect physical
conditioning. Concentration is a
function of the body's stamina.

Hello. In the spirit of your continued
friendship, I bring you greetings
from $Nf.

Follow your convictions. Listen to
your intuition.

We all contributed. Now, let's do
it again.

No need to rush things. Let's take our
time to ensure we get results.

I feel the hand of the goddess guiding
me toward something new.

I am Byleth. I have some experience
as an instructor, if that is something
you would find useful.

As a mercenary, I learned early on in
life to accept that people die. It's the
cold reality of the battlefield.$k$pThe more time I spend teaching,
however, the more my perspective
seems to change.$k$pI don't want that for my students.
I want them to be safe and happy.
And I...don't want to lose them.$k$pI'm sure you have a similar motive to
fight. You strike me as that sort of
person, $Nu.$k$pI imagine, as we spend time together,
I will begin to feel that way about you
as well. I suppose we'll find out.
This is a place of learning.
This is how it's done.
So, what's your move?
Show me what you've learned.
Let this be a lessonâ€¦
This festival should prove interesting. I appreciate the invitation.

What are you doing? Is this some kind of tradition
I don't know about?

I imagine that a city devoted to the study of magic
must be full of wonders.
For the sake of my students, I must use this sabbatical to learn as much as I can.
A festival is a gathering for the enjoyment of its participants. Let's observe.

It is a strange twist of fate, my being here. Yet I
sense the goddess's hand in it, somehow.

I promise you this: I will always use my power to strive
for greater heights, no matter the circumstances.
Ready.
Let me think...
All right.
